name: GENERAC 6245 Automatic Standby Generator,8 LP/7 NG kW

reviews.name: GENERAC 6245 Automatic Standby Generator,8 LP/7 NG kW
reviews.reviewText: super engineering,this product will save my house from hurricanes with resultant flooding from loss of sump pump due to electricity outages
reviews.title: great

reviews.name: GENERAC 6245 Automatic Standby Generator,8 LP/7 NG kW
reviews.reviewText:
Had the unit professionally installed in 2013.
Works great, lost power 5 times in 2014, kicked on, ran for nearly 24 hours during one outage. Propane fueled unit. 8KW unit.
reviews.title: 5 Stars

reviews.name: GENERAC 6245 Automatic Standby Generator,8 LP/7 NG kW
reviews.reviewText: I've had this unit a couple of years, and has been good. However since it has seen this sub zero temps arrive the weekly start up has not happened 3 times. I had to manualy start up the unit. with the help of my installer [ very helpful ] via the phone .
reviews.title: Happy so far

reviews.name: GENERAC 6245 Automatic Standby Generator,8 LP/7 NG kW
reviews.reviewText: great not haveing to worry about the electric going off again
reviews.title: great and reliable

reviews.name: GENERAC 6245 Automatic Standby Generator,8 LP/7 NG kW
reviews.reviewText: We have had several power outages and our Generac generator starts automatically within a few seconds each and every time. The generator will run until the power comes back on and automatically turns itself off. We love the fact that we never have to fill a fuel tank. Our Generac generator is conected to the natural gas line that comes to our home. Our Generac generator automatically test start and runs for ten minutes every week. We are one and a half year proud and very pleased Generac generator owners. Thank you Generac for making an economical worry free product.
reviews.title: Excellent Product
